title: Wrong server time and date/lag
body:
Im playing in EU Nordic & East server 7.11 ver
I noticed that the  date in** _Champion loading screen_** where the game will start is wrong.
It says "(May 24 2017/22:49:12)". but its currently June 9!
Im curious that it might be causing the lag during team fights.

I also reported this already in riots to receive a faster solution

Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body: Your PC clock settings might be inaccurate!  Double check to make sure your [Windows Clock](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) is correct and in real-time.  I hope that helps!
